title: Top of the Line Christmas Gifts
itunes:title: Top of the Line Christmas Gifts
description: This afternoon the guys light up the Zino Platinum gift pack and a Diamond Crown while they discuss the top single cigar gifts for him.  They talk about celebrity cigars, a factory fire that will slow a cigar company's production and the latest smoking ban to hit the rails.  All this and more on The Cigar Authority.
